description:
The sibling gag comedy manga centers around Umaru, Taihei's little sister who boasts beautiful looks as well as prowess in both school and sports. However, "Himouto" (beautiful little sister) has a certain secret.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

node.description:
__Agency:__ 81 Produce

__[Profile (81 Produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%9F%E8%A1%8C&label=1&cell004=&name=%E7%94%B0%E4%B8%AD%E3%80%80%E3%81%82%E3%81%84%E3%81%BF&id=241) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/kanataimi/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kanataimi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanataimi/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuNJGVAHVT_A6q5GSFpKjHg)__

__Non-anime roles:__
- Rei - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Royal Fortune - Azur Lane (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akari_kageyama)

On January 1st, 2024, she announced on her Twitter account that she got married to a man from outside the entertainment industry. 

__Non-anime roles:__
Aoba - Azur Lane
Furutaka - Azur Lane
Kako - Azur Lane
Kinugasa - Azur Lane

__Agency:__ Toy's Factory

[ToysFactory Profile](https://www.toysfactory.co.jp/artist/harukashiraishi/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/shiraishi-haruka/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shiraharu48?s=09)

Haruka Shiraishi is a Japanese actress and voice actress. She was previously affiliated with Hirata Office, but is currently affiliated with Toy's Factory.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Rupee - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Folkwang - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Blücher - Azur Lane
- Agano - Azur Lane
- Le Malin - Azur Lane
- Erina - Tevi (VG)
- Grace Howard - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

He began playing classical piano at the age of 5 and learned other instruments from his experience playing with a brass band (flute) and rock band (drums). After graduating from the Nihon University College of Arts he worked as a composer at KOEI, working on the music for a number of their games. He left the company in 2006 and has since been composing for TV, anime, and movies.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mariko_itoh222) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/okome2014/)

In 2008, she married fellow animator [Tatsufumi Tamakawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109607/Tatsufumi-Itou), who changed his name to Tatsufumi Itou after marrying her. 

Her husband passed away from a brain hemorrhage on May 23, 2020.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nara_kappa) | [Alt Twitter](https://twitter.com/narak0999)

Freelance Japanese animator and director. After debuting in 2012, he joined [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/) in 2014. In 2020 he became a freelancer and would make his directorial debut on episode 6 of [Wonder Egg Priority](https://anilist.co/anime/124845/WONDER-EGG-PRIORITY). 

Not to be confused with the [director](https://anilist.co/staff/104990/), who isn't an animator.

__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Website](http://manyo-portal.info/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MANYO_arcane)

**Tomomi Teratani**, better known as Manyo, or alternatively known as Shinnyo Ryuuzouji, is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and keyboardist, who specializes in background music and theme songs for console and PC games.

[Company site's profile (Hifumi Inc.)](https://hifumi-inc.co.jp/ogura-asuka/)

Ogura Asuka is a composer, arranger, and lyricist affiliated with Hifumi Inc.
